snippet: In the video, Human Rights Watch reveals disturbing violence in Russia against gay people, and says that the authorities there have failed to protect them and has emboldened attackers.
abstract: In the video, Human Rights Watch reveals disturbing violence in Russia against gay people, and says that the authorities there have failed to protect them and has emboldened attackers.

headline.main: Rights Group Releases Video of LGBT Attacks in Russia

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
